configuration.ansible-playbook-inline:
- hosts: '${node.name}'
  gather_facts: yes
  
  vars:
    ansible_winrm_reconnection_backoff_factor: 2.0
    ansible_winrm_reconnection_retries: 6
    linux_os_name: "{{ ansible_facts.distribution | default(omit) }} {{ ansible_facts.distribution_version | default(omit) }} ({{ ansible_facts.distribution_release | default(omit) }})"
    windows_os_name: "{{ ansible_facts.os_name | default(omit) }}"
    os_name: "{{ (ansible_facts.system == 'Linux') | ternary(linux_os_name, windows_os_name) }}"
    windows_ip_addresses: "{{ ansible_facts.ip_addresses | default(omit) }}"
    linux_ip_addresses: "{{ ansible_facts.all_ipv4_addresses | default(omit) }}"
    ip_addresses: "{{ (ansible_facts.system == 'Linux') | ternary(linux_ip_addresses, windows_ip_addresses) }}"

  tasks:
  
  - debug:
      msg:
      - "All facts: {{ansible_facts.system}}"
      - "System: {{ansible_facts.system}}"
      - "OS Family: {{ansible_facts.os_family}}"
      - "OS Name: {{os_name}}"
      - "IP Addresses: {{ip_addresses}}"
